entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few rain showers beginning in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
